remarks: Closure of a finite group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzcl.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzcl.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. B ) $.
